Life is full of problems, let's create some solutions...

That pretty much sums me up. I love dealing with complex problems in a creative way, whether it be code, design or just fixing my partner's computer. I aim for simple, intuitive solutions that will improve the lives around me.

Currently seeking employment as a front-end UI developer
